branchCategory.name: Metric Specifications (AF*00/11, Large Flow Air Filter)
branchCategory.description: <p>Series AF modular style air filter is a cost effective, clean looking solution to your filtration needs. Its' modular design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment. The series is available in six size options with a wide range of accessories.</p>
